name: No One Will Escape
description:
NOWE
No One Will Escape
Early prototype - still no gameplay. Download and look yourself.

The game about shooting prisoners from your tower.

Controls.
To reload pull the blue ball.
To aim put mouse in back of sniper.

If no files to download, we're sorry itch.io lag.

To implement:
-Story Mode

-More Rifles

-More Prisoners

-Customizing

-Skills.

feedback here - totaltomatogames@gmail.com
